Class Task

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.BackedObject
      ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BackedObject>
public class Task
extends BackedObject
implements java.io.Serializable

Holds the information associated with a task; aggregates Requirement.

Task

Task(java.lang.String id,
     java.util.Date created,
     java.util.Date lastModified,
     User creator,
     java.lang.String title,
     java.lang.String description,
     java.util.ArrayList<Requirement> requirements,
     VirtualRepository repo)
Construct a Task with backing in a persistent store.

Parameters:
id - - the ID of the Task
title - - the title of the task
description - - the description of the task
requirements - - A List of requirements dependent on the task
repo - - the repository in which we are stored

Task

Task(java.lang.String id,
     java.util.Date created,
     java.util.Date lastModified,
     User creator,
     java.lang.String title,
     java.lang.String description,
     int reqCount,
     VirtualRepository repo)
Construct a Task with backing in a persistent store, without preloaded requirements.

Parameters:
id - - the ID of the Task
title - - the title of the task
description - - the description of the task
reqCount - - The number of requirements this task has
repo - - the repository in which we are stored

Task

public Task()
Required to make Tasks serializable. The created Task object will not be used as an independent object; it will instead be used to store intermediate data until a proper object can be created in, or fetched from, the LocalRepository
